sentences.en: A sanguinary encounter seemed daily imminent between the two parties in the street of Baltimore.
sentences.cn: 双方随时可能在巴尔的摩大街上掐住对方的脖子.

sentences.en: He is alike to datura, the dependence blood is a nutrient, has deadly perilous, cruel sanguinary, so, he is too standing single.
sentences.cn: 他与曼陀罗一样，依赖鲜血为养份，有着致命的危险，残忍血腥，所以，他也是孤独的。

sentences.en: Suicide bombings ensuing due to revenge are prevalent in certain regions where sanguinary conflicts among various ethnic, religious and interest groups are ubiquitous.
sentences.cn: 自杀性爆炸事件的接连发生是因为到处存在那些被各种伦理性，宗教性及兴趣的团体在一些发生流血冲突的地区作恶。

sentences.en: With sangfroid the sanguinary man bangs his sanguine son against the hanger in the hangar.
sentences.cn: 残暴男子从容地把乐观的儿子往飞机库里的挂钩上猛撞.

trans.tran_cn: 血污的，流血的，血腥的，残暴的
